name: direction indicator
desc: Place a 3D North Arrow or Compass Rose in the Viewer.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Visible
properties.desc: Controls the visibility of the object.

properties.name: Display Type
properties.desc: The Display Type allows the user to select between a north arrow and a compass rose as output.

properties.name: X Center
properties.desc: The X center of the chosen display type object.

properties.name: Y Center
properties.desc: The Y center of the chosen display type object.

properties.name: Z Center
properties.desc: The Z center of the chosen display type object.

properties.name: Height Factor
properties.desc: The Height Factor scales the vertical height of the output object.

properties.name: Arrow Size
properties.desc: The Arrow Size scales the size in all dimensions of the output object.

properties.name: Arrow Bevel
properties.desc: The Arrow Bevel affects the degree of bevelling on the north arrow.

properties.name: Stem Width
properties.desc: The Stem Width affects the width of the arrow's stem (shaft).

properties.name: Stem Length
properties.desc: The Stem Length Factor affects the length of the arrow's stem (shaft).

properties.name: Triangle Base Factor
properties.desc: The Triangle Base Factor affects the width of the arrow's head.

properties.name: North Color
properties.desc: The North Arrow is a solid color which can be selected using this control.

properties.name: Rose Size
properties.desc: The Rose Size scales the output object in all dimensions.

properties.name: North Length
properties.desc: The North Length Factor allows you to exaggerate the length of the north pointing shaft.

properties.name: Sub Cardinal Length
properties.desc: The Sub-Cardinal Length Factor controls the length of the 45 degree shafts relative to the primary shafts.

properties.name: Inner Radius Factor
properties.desc: The Inner Radius Factor controls the radius of the solid core section.

properties.name: Primary Color
properties.desc: The compass rose is made of two colors the first can be set using this control.

properties.name: Secondary Color
properties.desc: The compass rose is made of two colors the second can be set using this control.

properties.name: Label Type
properties.desc: The Label Type allows the user to select between two font types. TrueType fonts are standard fonts.  Line fonts are low impact fonts which perform better when large numbers of labels are generated.

properties.name: Font Base Scale
properties.desc: The Font Base Scale affects the size of all text objects.

properties.name: Flip Labels
properties.desc: Flip Labels makes the text readable from the underside.

properties.name: Line Font Style
properties.desc: The Line Font Style allows the user to alter the basic look of the font.

properties.name: TrueType Font Style
properties.desc: The TrueType Font Style allows the user to alter the basic look of the font.

properties.name: Font Color
properties.desc: The Font Color allows the user to set the value for the color of the Font.

properties.name: North Label
properties.desc: The North Label sets all values related to the text on the North end of the either the compass rose or the north arrow.

properties.name: East Label
properties.desc: The East Label sets all values related to the text on the East end of the compass rose.

properties.name: South Label
properties.desc: The South Label sets all values related to the text on the South end of the compass rose.

properties.name: West Label
properties.desc: The West Label sets all values related to the text on the West end of the compass rose.

properties.name: Sub Cardinal Labels
properties.desc: The Sub Cardinal Labels control sets all values related to the text at the sub cardinal directions of the compass rose.
